medium: Watercolor, ink and metallic inks on paper
title: Ketubah (marriage contract)
marks: Signature LRC, in black ink: [AIMEE O.]
description: Hebrew text at center surrounded by four figures with joined hands at bottom; tree, flowers, birds and smiling sun at R; water with fish, stars and smiling moon at L
creditline: This gift is donated in loving memory of Marty Abramson (1963-1993) by his wife, artist Aimee Orkin, friends and family.  Although his life ended short, his loving kindness, concern for humanity and humor impacted his community greatly
